attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Student finance should be available to all students.  Students should not be discriminated against, for the purposes of student fee loans, due to "excessive prior education".

While we understand the need to stop "career" students, it is unfair to disallow students a loan, because they have undertaken a higher education course in the past.  Sometimes over 15 years previously.

This will encourage more mature students to return to education, benefitting the economy and country as a whole.
